title: Do Emotes Make Us Worse People? - Extra Credits Gaming

media:group.media:title: Do Emotes Make Us Worse People? - Extra Credits Gaming
media:group.media:description:
Wanna watch without ads and see exclusive content? Go to http://curiositystream.com/extracredits​ to get a full year of Curiosity Stream & Nebula for $14.79 - that's 26% off! 

Emotes! They're everywhere! On your phone and in your games but are they making us worse people? Are they being used the way we think they should Or should we be trying to craft more emotes with the players' well-being in mind? Find out more in "Trolling with Emotes"!
